channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for PR

item.title: Report I-2025020043
item.description:
Report I-2025020043

Identified by scraper @ 2025-03-01T21:20:14+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-17
  • City: Carolina
  • State: PR
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: DHL EXPRESS (USA), INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On 02/17/2025 shipment was discovered during the shipment inspection process to contain hidden dangerous goods at the DHL SJU service station, 30 Central Sector Rd Caribbean Airport Facility, Carolina, PR 00979. Transportation by road has been confirmed.
